items.sentence: Tom told me that he wasn't interested in doing that.
What are the names of the twelve months of the year?
The red sweater is more expensive than the blue one.
Tom learned how to swim when he was three years old.
We can see things in the distance using a telescope.
If you want to keep meat for a long time, freeze it.
Did you buy the tractor you were considering buying?
I did see Tom yesterday, but I don't remember where.
Do you have any idea why Tom didn't want to do that?
Tom has to stay in Australia for another week or so.
